Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan MICroSTREP plus® Panel Amoxicillin/Clavulanic Acid (0.015/0.008 - 16/8 mcg/ml)
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of aerobic streptococci
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan MICroSTREP plus Panel addition of instrument read capability for Amoxicillin/Clavulanic Acid antimicrobial susceptibility testing.
Indications for Use Summary: For determining antimicrobial agent susceptibility of aerobic streptococci, including Streptococcus pneumoniae, using Amoxicillin/Clavulanic Acid on the MicroScan MICroSTREP plus Panel.
